def calculate_max_second_screen(N, B):
    optimal_presses = round(N / (2 * B))
    max_second_screen = optimal_presses / (N - B * optimal_presses)
    return max_second_screen

def calculate_max_second_screen(N, B):
    optimal_presses = round(N / (2 * B))
    max_second_screen = optimal_presses + (N - B * optimal_presses)
    return max_second_screen
